name: Spotify Test - Auto Run
postCreateCommand: pip install requests pandas && echo 'üöÄ RUNNING SPOTIFY TEST...' && python -c "import requests, base64, time; CLIENT_ID='efef0dbb87ee4c37b550508ae2791737'; CLIENT_SECRET='09c12b5178734b5aae18743d5b4335d5'; print('üîê Authenticating...'); credentials = base64.b64encode(f'{CLIENT_ID}:{CLIENT_SECRET}'.encode()).decode(); auth = requests.post('https://accounts.spotify.com/api/token', headers={'Authorization': f'Basic {credentials}', 'Content-Type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'}, data='grant_type=client_credentials'); token = auth.json()['access_token'] if auth.status_code == 200 else None; print('‚úÖ AUTHENTICATED' if token else '‚ùå AUTH FAILED'); test = requests.get('https://api.spotify.com/v1/audio-features/7qiZfU4dY1lWllzX7mPBI3', headers={'Authorization': f'Bearer {token}'}) if token else None; print(f'‚úÖ API TEST PASSED - Energy: {test.json()[\"energy\"]}' if test and test.status_code == 200 else '‚ùå API TEST FAILED'); print('üéâ SPOTIFY SYSTEM READY FOR 54K TRACKS!')" && echo '‚úÖ TEST COMPLETE - Check terminal output above'
